original: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco katakalyāṇo hoti, katakusalo, katabhīruttāṇo, akatapāpo, akataluddo, akatakibbiso.
analyzed: ▁idha ▁bhikkhave ▁ekacc o ▁kat a kalyāṇ o ▁hoti ▁kat akusal o ▁kat ab hīr u ttā ṇ o ▁akat a pāp o ▁akat a ludd o ▁akat a ki bb i so

original: So ‘kataṁ me kalyāṇan’tipi na tappati, ‘akataṁ me pāpan’tipi na tappati.
analyzed: ▁so ▁kataṃ ▁me ▁kalyāṇ anti pi ▁na ▁tap pati ▁akat aṃ ▁me ▁pāp anti pi ▁na ▁tap pati

original: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve dhammā atapanīyā”ti.
Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
